/usr/local/cuda-11.2/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler  -arch=sm_50 -O3 -DNDEBUG -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/TextHistogram_Solution.dir/Module7/TextHistogram/solution.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/TextHistogram_Solution.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-11.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-11.2/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lm -lcuda -lrt  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
